text: Scarlet was fucking insanely invincible i lucked out bad
author: revolvergod01

text:
No.
As I said, when you win, you basically break Scarlet, whom is discovered to be a battle android similar to a special character unlockable after another Mark hunt. You take her to a female scientist in one of the cities that you can ferry too, and she get's converted into a CPU unit for your tanks.
author: Coramelimane

text: She can cripple a tank (aka, break a section) with one shot of her Anti-tank rifle. So yes.
author: Coramelimane

text:
She's the final mark in the game. You absolutely have to be lv 200 to even barely survive fighting her. You need all the best gear, the highest level of shiny coat for your war dog and never ride in the tank. 

IF, and this is a very very big IF, you beat her, you find out she's actually an android. Taking her to the female scientist in one of the cities, I forget which, will turn her into the best CPU in the game.
author: Coramelimane
